### 1. How to publish 
 You create Rmarkdown on Rstudio, suppose title is **"myblogg"**,      
 then do below for publishing.
```
$git status
$git add .
$git rm --cached myblogg   
$git commit -m "~~~"
$git push    
```
### 2.Some bites

```
$git diff HEAD  
$git log
$git log --graph
$git branch
$git checkout netlify-deploy
$git checkout master
$git merge --no-f netlify-deploy

```
